price: 125. sorkocobbaxittet biyak-le (Yallih diinit loonuh yanin agaywaaga kinnuk) marah tugactek, toysa tama suurah obtim usun luk sugen munaafiqhannut munaafiqhannu keenih osisseeh usun korosuh anuk raben.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādathum rij'san ilā rij'sihim wamātū wahum kāfirūna
